text: Cleopa David Msuya (4 January 1931 - 7 May 2025) was a Tanzanian politician. He was Prime Minister of Tanzania from 7 November 1980 to 24 February 1983 and again from 7 December 1994 to 28 November 1995.Profile of Cleopa David MsuyaProfile at tanemb.se."Cleopa David Msuya: The man" , ThisDay, May 31, 2006. Msuya died from heart failure on 7 May 2025 at the age of 94, at a hospital in Dar es Salaam. ==Funeral== His State funeral will held in 1 June 2025 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Tanzania Category:Deaths from heart failure
title: Cleopa Msuya
